channel.title: Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: AppSource
item.description: Test & purchase AppSource The App is available on Microsoft AppSource. After downloading, the app is available to you free of charge for 5 processes. Once these are reached, you have the option to order the app directly. Your costs: Monthly subscription incl. maintenance per company with annual payment and term* 19,90€ Monthly subscription incl. maintenance per company with monthly payment and term* 25,90€ *Each additional customer or instance is charged with a 50% price advantage

item.title: OnPrem
item.description: Test & Purchase OnPrem You have the possibility to test our Connector 365 Mail Attachment Plus App without obligation or to purchase it directly. For this we need some information from you. To the form If you wish a test phase, you will receive the desired objects for one user and for a test period of 30 days. Before the end of the test period, we will contact you to take over the purchase or deactivate the test phase.
